Without a very tight waist I find myself adjusting and pulling up.  Something like Yoga they could be perfect.

title: Beautiful leggings
content: These leggings are super soft and lightweight. They not are compression leggings.  If you have ever bought true compression leggings from a "fab" VIP subscription company, You will not find that here. HOWEVER while the compression isn't there, I'm not sure if it was the print, because these are super flattering on. I am a size 4/ small.  I'm usually in the gym for about 3 hours and these held up to my routine. I do feel the tops roll down just a little but nothing crazy. It flops right back up when you stand up. Overall these are super comfortable to wear and when I would squat I did not see anything. Again, I cannot confirm if that's because of the pattern I chose, but everything was covered. I will buy these again and I will work out in these. I think these are worth it. And if you are looking for a new legging to try and you searched all over for decent leggings, try these! I would suggest making sure you buy the correct size for your body because as fabric stretches it becomes thinner. So if you order a size too small you might have issues when squatting.  I do not know how these hold up to running. I was jumping around, teaching class and I didn't have to adjust the pants. I do think a tighter compression would probably work better for running. This is perfect for for work, lifting,  or any kind of fitness classes.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
